location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Muscat to Captain Charles Sealy, Commander of the HC Cruizer Ternateand Senior Marine Officer in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing guidance (not present), from the Chief Secretary to the Bombay Government, defining the extent of the authority of the Resident in the Persian Gulf over the marine force in the Gulf.
